Constructor Detail

SyntacticPathExtractor

public SyntacticPathExtractor(String name,
                              SimpleFeatureExtractor pathMemberExtractor,
                              boolean partial)
Parameters:
name - this name will be given to the context of the generated feature.
pathMemberExtractor - this extractor will be used to get a feature for every node on the path, which will then be combined to form a single string. The extractor should preferably generate exactly one StringFeature, but must generate at least one StringFeature, LongFeature, DoubleFeature, or BooleanFeature. Only the first feature will then be used and naively converted to a string.
partial - if true, generate a partial path only, i.e. from the first node up to the lowest common ancestor of the two

SyntacticPathExtractor

public SyntacticPathExtractor(String name,
                              SimpleFeatureExtractor pathMemberExtractor)
This constructor defaults to a full rather than a partial path.

SyntacticPathExtractor

public SyntacticPathExtractor(SimpleFeatureExtractor pathMemberExtractor,
                              boolean partial)
This constructor doesn't assign a name to the generated feature.

SyntacticPathExtractor

public SyntacticPathExtractor(SimpleFeatureExtractor pathMemberExtractor)
This constructor doesn't assign a name to the generated feature and default to a full rather than a partial path.

Method Detail

extract

public List<Feature> extract(JCas jCas,
                             TreebankNode firstAnnotation,
                             TreebankNode lastAnnotation)
Extract a string representation of a path feature.

Parameters:
firstAnnotation - the first node of the path
lastAnnotation - the last node of the path
Returns:
List of one StringFeature, which contains a string representation of the path between the two nodes.

getPathToRoot

protected static List<TreebankNode> getPathToRoot(TreebankNode startNode)
Find the path from a TreebankNode to the root of the tree it belongs to.

Parameters:
startNode - The start node of the path
Returns:
A list of TreebankNodes that make up the path from startNode to the root of the tree
